authHelpBody.description: If you're not signed in, here's what we'll do when you click the button below
authHelpBody.message: 看來你尚未登入 Pinterest。讓我們先解決這個問題！

authHelpHead.description: You're not signed in. Let's get your attention with this headline. Might also be Hey! or Oops!

boardPickerSuccessLabel.description: Label in inline board picker after pin creation

choosePinMultiSelectHeader.description: New header message in the image picker overlay

choosePinSelectAllSubHeader.description: Subheader in the image picker overlay

extDescription.description: The extension's description, seen in gallery and extensions page
extDescription.message: 線上儲存你喜愛的點子以便日後輕鬆使用。

extName.description: The extension's title, seen in gallery and extensions page

help.description: Get help after a Pin create failure

msgLoginFail.description: Message shown when someone's login changes while the board picker is open
msgLoginFail.message: 很抱歉！發生了一點問題。請確認你已登入 Pinterest，然後再試一次。

nextAction.description: Press this button to go to the Create view when multiple images are selected

noPinDomain.description: The default message we alert when someone tries to use the browser button on a forbidden domain
noPinDomain.message: 很抱歉，我們並未開放從該網域收藏 Pin。若有疑問，請聯絡網站操作人員。

optionHide.description: Text next to the checkbox that turns off hoverbuttons

saveAction.description: Appears wherever we show a Save button or menu prompt

searchAction.description: Appears in the right-click-to-search menu item

selectAll.description: Text next to the checkbox that selects all images on the grid

signIn.description: Click this button to sign in on Pinterest

visitButton.description: Pin create success button to visit pin
